A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ItThe Last Jedi allows its heroes to experience failures and make necessary sacrifices. The action scenes- of which\, of course\, there were many- were brisk and not\, as many action scenes in Hollywood cinema have been over the last 15 to 20 years\, edited to the point where they confuse the viewer. I left the theatre much like I left the theatre after Star Wars\, as an 11-year old in 1977: Thrilled and realizing that my bladder was filled to the brim. I can't wait to see this installment of the franchise again.
